The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Monday 

Tomato & Ginger Soup with Rice Noodles – vegan /gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (tomato, rice noodle, white onion, ginger, soy gluten free, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Green Lentil – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (green lentils, celery, carrot, red onion, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or  gluten free option

Carrot Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (carrot, white sesame, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Poppy Seed and Lemon Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashews, almonds, dates, cocoa butter, lemon, poppy seeds, turmeric, unfiltered honey)
